info.name: List Item
info.description: Provides an automated solution to clients who would like to manage list items. This API provides methods to view, add, update or delete list items owned by the specified lists.

item.name: Get direct children of list item

header.description: Language code
Company UUID of the user (Used for x509 authorization)
The unique identifier of the consumer making the API calls. Minimum length: 6 characters
Concur Employee UUID of the caller (Used for x509 authorization)

query.description: Filter capabilities for Value OR ShortCode

response.name: Successfully got children of list item

item.name: Gets list items by query on id, long code or legacy item key. Supports batch get list items by ids or legacy item keys. Required query parameters: a single code OR one or more id(s) OR one or more legacyKey(s). Query parameters code, id, legacyKey cannot

header.description: Language code
Company UUID of the user (Used for x509 authorization)
The unique identifier of the consumer making the API calls. Minimum length: 6 characters
Concur Employee UUID of the caller (Used for x509 authorization)

query.description: The unique identifier of the list item. Maximum number of ids is 100
The unique identifier of the list item. Maximum number of ids is 100
The legacy unique identifier of the list item. Maximum number of the legacy keys is 100
The legacy unique identifier of the list item. Maximum number of the legacy keys is 100
